/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane road that meanders through a lush green forest. The road, appearing well-trodden, stretches out into the distance, inviting one to imagine where it might lead. On either side of the road, trees stand tall, their leaves a vibrant green, providing a canopy that filters the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. In the distance, the faint outline of mountains can be seen, adding depth and a sense of vastness to the landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the road, looking up at the towering trees and the expansive sky.
